https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1MXvLCiB2zjX43wYasmjh2a1Yh6.jpg 2012: Time For Change is a documentary feature that presents ways to transform our unsustainable society into a regenerative planetary culture. This can be achieved through a personal and global change of consciousness and the systemic implementation of ecological design. 2012: Time for Change
